title: 35: OBITCH gimme brain...
description:
HELLO! Happy Thursday Geoffs! This week you are in for a wild ride. What’s got us spinning in our coffins? Maternal somatic support after brain death, posthumous sperm retrieval, and the truth about organ donation! We’ve got an obituary for an inventor, a two-for-one and of course, we’ve got some dumb.ass.criminalssssss! 
Follow along online: instagram.com/obitchuarypod
Write to us: obitpod@gmail.com
Get a cameo from us: https://www.cameo.com/obitchuarypodcast
Sponsors: 
Daily Harvest: Go to dailyharvest.com/obit for up to $40 off your first box!  BetterHelp: Betterhelp.com/obit to save 10% on your first month! Stamps: Go to stamps.com and click the microphone at the top of the page and enter code ‘OBIT’ for a special offer that includes a 4-week trial, free postage, and a digital scale!  Apostrophe: Visit Apostrophe.com/obit and use code ‘OBIT’ to save $15 off your first visit. 
Sources: 
https://www.nytimes.com/2022/02/02/business/john-koss-dead.html  organdonor.gov  https://www.scoopwhoop.com/Unbelievable-Organ-Transplant-Stories-That-Are-True/ americantransplantfoundation.com https://www.verywellhealth.com/brain-death-what-does-it-mean-3157217 https://core.org https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=W_lEJsNcnWA https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/58074222/julie-marie-helgeson https://www.newsweek.com/florida-man-68-crashes-lawn-mower-cop-car-tells-police-officer-f-im-drunk-1420389 https://www.huffpost.com/entry/gary-wayne-anderson-dui-lawnmower_n_5cd09fa6e4b0e4d75736e1cf https://nypost.com/2022/01/31/semi-nude-women-advertise-funeral-service-in-tasteless-video/ https://bmcmedicine.biomedcentral.com/articles/10.1186/1741-7015-8-74 https://www.tampabay.com/archive/1997/06/17/death-reunites-dovey-with-twin-lovey/?outputType=amp https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Posthumous_sperm_retrieval https://www.vatican.va/roman_curia/congregations/cfaith/documents/rc_con_cfaith_doc_19870222_respect-for-human-life_en.html https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Maternal_somatic_support_after_brain_death See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.

HELLO! Happy Thursday Geoffs! This week you are in for a wild ride. What’s got us spinning in our coffins? Maternal somatic support after brain death, posthumous sperm retrieval, and the truth about organ donation! We’ve got an obituary for an inventor, a two-for-one and of course, we’ve got some dumb.ass.criminalssssss! 
Follow along online: instagram.com/obitchuarypod
Write to us: obitpod@gmail.com
